name: TheMarkTwainFlasher
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to daily quotes from Mark Twain, spoken by voice actor Derek Botten. 

For more on Derek Botten, please go to: http://www.derekbotten.com/

This Flash Briefing was created and is being hosted by witlingo. If you would like to publish your Flash Briefing on Witlingo, go to: https://www.witlingo.com/flashbriefing/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
